FuncDef:
The server enable command enables the gRPC service.
The undo server enable command disables the gRPC service. The server enable command enables the gRPC service. The undo server enable command disables the gRPC service. By default, the gRPC service is disabled.
ExtraInfo: If a collector functioning as a client initiates a connection to a device functioning as a server, the data sampled is dynamically subscribed to. In this case, you need to enable the gRPC service on the server.
